markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Floors](/Rules.aspx?ID=631)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 516 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Natural underground environments rarely have flat floors, instead featuring abrupt changes in elevation that result in difficult terrain, uneven ground, and inclines.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Floors
